Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='RBG99')

BibliographicData.Title: Auditory belt and parabelt projections to the prefrontal cortex in the rhesus monkey

Reference.Comments: Only a general pattern of labelling was given for this injection.
